wiki-temporarily-unavailable-subtitle: The Miraheze wiki that you are trying to access is temporarily unavailable.
wiki-temporarily-unavailable-more: You can join the Miraheze Discord server or find updates on Twitter for more information.
db141wiki-what-happened-more: Some of the disks on one of the database servers on Miraheze, the platform that hosts this wiki, had some issues that caused the entire database server and all wikis on it to go down. We are working hard on fixing this issue, but unfortunately we do not have an ETA at this time, for when this wiki will be back online. We apologise for the inconvenience. You can join our Discord server with the above link or follow our Twitter updates ([https://twitter.com/miraheze|@miraheze] or [https://twitter.com/MirahezeStatus|@MirahezeStatus]) for more information and live updates as we have them.
page-not-found-alternatively: Try visiting the [/|Main Page] or read [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTTP_404|more information] about this type of error.
page-not-found-more: We couldn't find this page.  Check your spelling and try again or click the link above.
wiki-not-found: We couldn't find this wiki. Check your spelling and try again.
wiki-not-found-browse: This wiki does not exist on our servers. You can browse wikis on our network [https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/Special:WikiDiscover|here] or [https://archive.org/search.php?query=miraheze|view archive.org archives].
wiki-not-found-contact: If this is a problem, please [https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help_center|contact us].
